description: Black plate worn by knights who serve death itself. Some knights, unable to rest in death, rise as grave knightsâ€”undead warriors bound to their armor. This particular set was recovered from a defeated grave knight and cleansed through holy rituals. It retains some dark power, granting resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to being frightened, but whispers temptations of eternal service.
name: Grave Knight Armor
